content:
Hi everyone,

in HAPI FHIR there is an annotation type called ResourceDef for extending FHIR resource classes. You can find it here: https://hapifhir.io/hapi-fhir/docs/model/custom_structures.html#extending-fhir-resource-classes and here: https://hapifhir.io/hapi-fhir/apidocs/hapi-fhir-base/ca/uhn/fhir/model/api/annotation/ResourceDef.html.

We need this for our implementation. What is the equivalent attribute in C# / .NET SDK for "@ResourceDef(name="Composition", profile="profileUrl)"?
Thanks!
Is there another way in .NET to achieve this?

Solved it. This can be done by passing the URL of the Custom StructureDefinition to the Profile Property of the Meta object.
Extension methods is wrong.
Christian Moebus has marked this topic as resolved.
